meanings.sent1: Following the rules legitimizes your actions.
meanings.sent2: Obeying the law legitimizes your behavior.
meanings.sent3: Paying your taxes legitimizes your status as a responsible citizen.
meanings.sent4: Respecting others legitimizes your place in the community.

meanings.definition: To give authority or justification to.
meanings.sent1: A signature from the boss legitimizes the decision.
meanings.sent2: Evidence can legitimize a claim in court.
meanings.sent3: A fancy title can legitimize even the silliest of tasks.
meanings.sent4: The crown legitimizes the king's power.
meanings.sent5: A badge legitimizes the authority of a police officer.

meanings.sent2: A witness can legitimize an alibi.
meanings.sent3: A secret handshake can legitimize a friendship.
meanings.sent4: A trophy legitimizes the hard work put in.
